about_the_game:
A set of items that will come in handy from the middle to the end of the story.

Star of the Sword+ x2
Star of the Axe+ x2
Star of the Shield+ x2
Star of Armor+ x2
Star of the Grail+ x2
Star of the Lyre+ x2
Star of Unchanging Love+ x2

*Can also be obtained in-game.
*Open [DLC] under [Items] in the main menu and select new items to receive them.
*Please note that all items in excess of the maximum amount will be lost.
detailed_description:
